usuario_10.author: SunlessSketcher (@SunlessSketcher)
usuario_10.content: I think my favorite thing about #Starfield is just how many cute and happy encounters there are. I've run into a little girl selling lemonade, a Universalist pilgrim on a journey, and a pair of husbands who were giving out ship parts for their 10th anniversary.
